name: Highway Traffic: Bus Racer
description:
Highway Traffic: Bus Racer!!!
Touch gas button to accelerate and let's go. Take a test to check your driving quality and learn more driving rules. There is simple task first you drive bus on racing terrain and avoid to hit the other traffic that is on the road and also avoid to hit the traffic.
Features

Challenging and outstanding environment with 3D graphics
Select heavy big buses.
User friendly game play
Different camera angles that give you more control to drive oil tanker
Bus race Simulation with Smooth Steering
